name: Speed Platformer
description:
Controls

- Move: Arrow keys
- Jump: Z key
- Dash: C key
(Keys can be rebounded)

Description

This is a speed based platformer, where your goal is to reach the end of every level as fast as possible. Jump, slide and dash to get through many obstacles! 
(Character customization included)

Let's see how fast you can be!

(Intake Game)
